# actionTerminated(event:)

**Instance Method**

The function used to respond to action terminated events.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func actionTerminated(event: Self.EventType)
```

## Discussion

Action terminated is raised when playback is terminated and the animation is removed from the animation system. This can occur before the animation has a chance to complete if the user manually stops the animation by calling [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationPlaybackController/stop()].
